title: Toshiba e-STUDIO2518A vsftpd  Incorrect Permission Assignment Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Toshiba e-STUDIO2518A printers. Authentication is required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the vsftpd daemon. The issue results from incorrect permissions set on folders. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute code in the context of root.
addtionnal_details: Toshiba has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.toshibatec.com/information/20240531_01.html
timeline:
2024-02-14 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2024-06-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
credit: Zhenhua Huang from trendmicro, Minmin Li
